Welcome back MEgan :)


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> >Hello!
> I'm a new member to the NBW, though I've RPed here before and just 
returned 
> after a year.
> Call it a long "vacation", if you'd like.
> Anyway, the bios for my characters will be at the end of this first 
post and 
> a file containing Blue Fire's vehicle mode will be attached. So 
it's going 
> to be a bit long.
> Though I'm glad to be back, and I hope you enjoy what you read. ^-^
> Thanks!
> 
> 
> 
> The stellar winds which drifted through space were calm and smooth 
just out 
> beyond the metallic atmosphere of the Transformer planet, known as 
> Cybertron.
> Which, ultimately, turned out to be the ideal working conditions 
for a black 
> and gray Decepticon research vessel stationed just above the silver 
planet.
> Its mission: to study and record a particularly strange space 
anomaly that 
> had developed months ago, a little too close to Cybertron for 
comfort.
> 
> ~
> A few weeks earlier, at one of the many secret meetings the Council 
of 
> Elders undertook, it was agreed upon that this new distortion in 
space 
> needed looking into.
> So, naturally these days; long after the Great Wars which nearly 
shook the 
> entire universe to pieces, the Decepticons were chosen as the prime 
> candidates to handle this matter.
> No, the Maximals and Predacons which now dominated the planet, nor 
what few 
> Autobots remained couldn't be bothered to risk their own peoples. 
But, 
> although there had been peace for centuries, the Decepticons had 
always 
> seemed the most expendable.
> They'd truly sunk that low.
> 
> ~
> Still, those aboard research ship couldn't complain.
> Because research and exploration was what they were all about, and 
this 
> newest occurrence in the delicate fabric of space fascinated them 
to no end.
> Daily the 4 of them had worked. Scanning over and measuring the 
variety of 
> energies that were emanating from the undulating tare. Which 
looked, 
> externally, like a circular patch of heat waves against the dark 
backdrop of 
> outer space. Distorting the stars.
> 
> Dust storm, the smallest of the group and a professional scout, 
thought it 
> looked neat and tried to find out all that he could about it. Even 
if it 
> meant bothering his 2 superiors in the process. Bombarding them 
with 
> questions that they couldn't possibly answer at this time.
> Until Blue Flame, the 2nd in command, finally had to give him a 
good bop on 
> the head and tell the little dune bunny that that was enough.
> Much to the relief of the rest of the crew.
> 
> Still, it was far better to be curious about everything then 
interested in 
> nothing, so Diesel Runner (D.R. for short) simply let Dust storm 
be. Being 
> the Commander of the mission, she was the one who had to put up 
with him the 
> most anyway, Since she couldn't expect Blue Flame or the quiet Dark 
Cloud 
> to. The ships aerial surveillance officer.
> Most of all, however, they all got along the best that Decepticons 
ever 
> could be expected to and completed their given assignments on time.
> 
> It was just that the space anomaly was turning out to be a bit more 
> difficult then could have been expected.
> And a shock of all shocks when it began to implode.
> Scrambling to their stations, it was discovered that the distortion 
tare was 
> collapsing in on itself and beginning to suck in everything that it 
could as 
> its gravity field collapsed. Including the Decepticon ship!
> 
> " It's pulling us in!" Blue Flame reported from his position at the 
helm 
> controls as the bridge flashed with warning sirens. " And I can't 
break us 
> loose!"
> " Did you try the reverse thrusters?" D.R. asked from her seat at 
the 
> command post. Only to receive a report from her 2nd in command that 
they 
> were on full and still had no effect.
> Dust Storm freaked as the tare grew closer. " We're gunna DIE!!"
> Dark Cloud tried to correct their navigations back to Cybertron, 
with no 
> effect. Mumbling to himself, " Where the Pit are those recovery 
drones when 
> you need them?!"
> All of a sudden, everything inside of the ship went black and power 
ceased 
> to flow throughout the bridge system.
> Blue Flame slammed his fists against the controls. " On great! Now 
the 
> console's dead!"
> "Over here too." Dark Cloud reported from his post.
> 
> The ship was now on the fringe of the collapsing anomaly and the 
ship began 
> to shake violently.
> So violent, that it began to fell apart.
> Inside the bridge, things were no better. And all Hell broke loose.
> 
> " Hang onto something!" D.R. ordered just before they were sucked 
in and 
> everything went black.
> 
> The tare disappeared and the atmosphere around Cybertron was left 
peaceful 
> once more.
> 
> 
>
